title: The Great Gatsby
description: F. Scott Fitzgerald’s classic novel capturing the glamour and tragedy of the Roaring Twenties. A poignant look at the American Dream.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Jane Austen's beloved romantic comedy about the spirited Elizabeth Bennet and the proud Mr. Darcy, set in early 19th-century England.

title: The Art of War
description: Sun Tzu’s ancient Chinese military treatise on strategy and tactics, influencing leaders and strategists across centuries.

title: The Prince
description: Niccolò Machiavelli's seminal work on political power and realpolitik, offering candid advice on leadership and statecraft.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: uval Noah Harari explores the history of Homo sapiens, from the emergence of cognitive abilities to the modern globalized world. A thought-provoking look at our species' past and future.

title: The Psychology of Money: Timeless Lessons on Wealth, Greed, and Happiness
description: Morgan Housel explores how psychology, rather than finance, drives successful investing. This book reveals how our emotions and biases affect our financial decisions and offers timeless lessons for building wealth.
